data.name: 0000 (098.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Say, Haruhi-- What's your plan from here on out?

data.name: 0001 (098.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: All I'm concerned about is when this unproductive summer camp is going to end.

data.name: 0002 (098.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Didn't I tell you? Our objective is to witness unnatural phenomena with our own eyes.

data.name: 0003 (098.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: We won't stop until we've accomplished that.

data.name: 0004 (098.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: In that case, I get the feeling we'll be continuing this camp for the rest of our lives.

data.name: 0005 (098.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Rest assured, because I--the brigade chief--will be with you all the whole time!

data.name: 0006 (098.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: How is anyone gong to rest assured hearing that?

data.name: 0007 (098.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Not just Mikuru, but I'll be with you as well.

data.name: 0008 (098.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: As a guy, you should be weeping with joy.

data.name: 0009 (098.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I guess in a certain way it's true, I do want to cry.

data.name: 0010 (098.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: The SOS Brigade supreme brigade chief-- That's me!

data.name: 0011 (098.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: U-umm, I think you're a really incredible person, Suzumiya--

data.name: 0012 (098.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What's this, all of a sudden?

data.name: 0013 (098.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Always thinking up unthinkable things to do... even if they're a little troubling...

data.name: 0014 (098.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: At first it was a little... you know...

data.name: 0015 (098.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: But now I think I'm glad I was brought into the SOS Brigade.

data.name: 0016 (098.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What an admirable attitude.

data.name: 0017 (098.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It's so great I'd love to let a certain someone hear it.

data.name: 0018 (098.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Ahaha…

data.name: 0019 (098.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: But you really are the best brigade chief, Suzumiya.

data.name: 0020 (098.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Look, you don't need to go out of your way to tell me.

data.name: 0021 (098.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'm already very aware that I'm the best!

data.name: 0022 (098.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: The best brigade chief.

data.name: 0023 (098.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: To say you're the best would imply there are other objects of comparison.

data.name: 0024 (098.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: There's no such thing!

data.name: 0025 (098.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: The brigade chief none other than supreme and ultimate me!

data.name: 0026 (098.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Then the qualifier "best" is not appropriate.

data.name: 0027 (098.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You don't get it, Yuki.

data.name: 0028 (098.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: The moment you're compared to someone else, you can no longer claim to be the best.

data.name: 0030 (098.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Well, not that you'd ever understand if I just explain it to you.

data.name: 0031 (098.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: First, just take a gooood look at me.

data.name: 0032 (098.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Me and the way my SOS Brigade livens up the world, that is!

data.name: 0033 (098.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Miss Suzumiya, I'd like to ask--What do you mean by a brigade member's mental attitude?

data.name: 0034 (098.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That would of course be...

data.name: 0035 (098.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Keeping a close eye on me--the brigade chief.

data.name: 0036 (098.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: What do you mean?

data.name: 0037 (098.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Not just listening to what I have to say.

data.name: 0038 (098.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Always predicting what I'm thinking.

data.name: 0039 (098.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Occasionally you need to anticipate things and prepare for them.

data.name: 0040 (098.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You're far superior to Kyon in that regard, Koizumi.

data.name: 0041 (098.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Thank you very much.

data.name: 0042 (098.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: But that's only because I'm keeping a close watch of the greatest brigade chief.

data.name: 0043 (098.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Yes yes! You really get it, don't you! That's that's so excellent about you.
